message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is highly valued by many of our customers. I believe it could be a great asset for you. Would you like to consider purchasing it for $85?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Can you consider that?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your input. While I understand your budget constraints, we're unable to lower the price below $85 due to the value and quality of the product. However, I'd like to propose an alternative: if you purchase the product within the next 48 hours, I can offer a 10% discount on shipping costs. What do you think about that?
I appreciate the shipping discount offer, but I'm still looking to save more on the product price. Would you be willing to meet me at $75?

I see your point, Bob. Considering the value and the quality of the product, I'm willing to offer a special deal for you. If you decide to purchase the product today, I can provide you with a free upgrade to the latest version of the software included with the product. This upgrade usually costs $30. Would this be acceptable to you?
The free upgrade is a nice gesture, but I'm still looking to save more on the product price. Would you be willing to meet me at $78?

Thank you for considering our product, Bob. I appreciate your patience and understanding. As a compromise, I am willing to offer a $5 discount on the product price, making it $80. Additionally, I would like to include a complimentary gift card worth $10 that can be used towards future purchases. Would this arrangement work for you?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still looking to save more. Would you be willing to meet me at $76?

I understand your position, Bob. Let me make one final offer. For $80, I will include a personalized setup service for you, ensuring that the product is configured to your preferences right out of the box. This service is usually priced separately at $20. Would this be something you might find appealing?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not willing to go above $75. I'm willing to walk away if we can't come to an agreement. Would you be willing to meet me at $75?
